review.title: “I determine if I want to succeed or fail”
review.pros: Pros – The company is a pure meritocracy. Your efforts and dedication determine how much you earn. It is not a place to mark time and collect a paycheck. The tools and support features are in place it just depends on the person and if they want to make it happen.
review.cons: Cons – The downside is part of the upside. If one is not entrepreneurial minded there will be difficulties in working here.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need more aggressive marketing programs.
